brand.title: The <1>community-led platform</1> for private market investments

disclaimer.title: Before continuing, please pay attention to the following
disclaimer.description: You will need the company’s incorporation certificate (KBIS, BCE extract, ...), the latest bylaws, the diagram of the cap table and the latest financial statements. For more information see here (lien à embed) https://docs.roundtable.eu/en/articles/6479467-how-do-i-perform-my-kyb-check All personal information is confidential, is only used for Anti-Money Laundering purposes, and won’t be shared with your co-investors.
